name: Ant Evolution - Ant.io
description:
A free, satisfying single player game inspired by agar.io and evolution games. Smash smaller insects to increase your mass. Try to avoid bigger enemies by hiding under flowers or use your abilities to run away. End the game by killing the boss. The game is also inspired by other evolution games like tasty planet. Smashing the ants can be used as an anxiolytic experience. Start the game and relax!

How to play:

Use the arrows to move (Recommened, but you can also use the touchpad).

Click on your powers on the left of the screen to activate your abilities.
